RelatedSentence: Officers will be out in force over the next few weeks cracking down on motorists who are not wearing seat belts , the department said in a statement .
The Los Angeles County Sheriff 's Department and California Highway Patrol also are participating in the campaign , which runs through June 1 .
Even with a seat belt usage rate of 97 percent , California still has 800,000 or more who are n't buckling up , police said .
In 2012 , 10,335 people who were killed in motor vehicle crashes were not wearing their seat belts .
In 2012 , 61 percent of passenger vehicle occupants killed from 6 p.m. to 5:59 a.m. were not wearing their seat belts .
